objects.description: APT28 has used built-in tools like ps aux on macOS to determine which processes are running. (Citation: XAgentOSX) An APT28 loader Trojan will enumerate the victim's processes searching for explorer.exe if its current process does not have necessary permissions. (Citation: Unit 42 Playbook Sofacy Feb 2018)

external_references.description: Robert Falcone. (2017, February 14). XAgentOSX: Sofacy's Xagent macOS Tool. Retrieved July 12, 2017.
Unit 42. (2018, February 28). Unit 42 Playbook Viewer - Sofacy. Retrieved March 15, 2018.
